text:
Health is infrastructure—

Introducing The Health Dividend, a new initiative from Economist Impact

How can investment in health support economic vitality? Our trusted research and analysis explores how a healthier population can have wide-reaching, compounding returns.

@ Health and wellbeing: advancing policies, innovations and investments that promote health, boost productivity and unlock human potential.

@ Health systems: developing effective, responsive systems that support innovation, economic development and social progress.

@ Health and the economy: demonstrating how good health powers progress for people, economies and society.

Scan to find out more:

impact.economist.com/health-dividend

Economist Impact, a commercial arm of The Economist Group, works with organisations globally to further their mission and catalyse progress. Economist Impact operates independently of The Economist
